title: I’m the Otome Game’s Friend A, but I Decided to Resign from That Role and Instead Enjoy My Own Life - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Clever Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Mob Protagonist   Modern Day   Oneshot   Otome Game   Reincarnated in a Game World   Underestimated Protagonist
author: Sakura   桜
description:
A girl realized that she was reborn into an Otome Game. 

E? Heroine’s Friend A? A mob character? If so, then, I do not really need to involve myself in it, right? I should be able to do whatever I want with my life, right? 

A reincarnated girl who decided to ignore the Otome game and instead enjoy her own life.>
